Help me understand.   We have shootings in workplaces and that doesn't stop the way we treat violence and guns. We have shootings in an elementary school. Same outcome. We have shootings at a concert venue. Same outcome. We have shootings in churches (most recently in Texas). Same outcome.  We have shootings on campuses.  Same outcome.   Safe places -- work, worship, schools -- are now unsafe. Why aren't we doing anything about guns and gun violence?  Last time I checked, these guns were used to kill innocent people, not animals in the wild and not for self-protection.  Without some change, we will not see change in the violence is protected places. What kind of world is that? Oh, we blame mental illness.  Perhaps there has been mental diminution in those who have been the shooters. But, isn't there a link between access to weapons (their purchase and continued use) and gun violence? Might it be time to reconsider--finally --quality background checks, limits on numbers of purchases and a national database that works. What will it take? Post being shot, even Rep. Scalise was not against guns.

Have you ever been stuck in a rut? Have you felt like you can't get out of it, no matter how hard you try? When you are diagnosed with an incurable disease like cancer, it's easy to grieve and get stuck in a mental rut. Even as the "bubbly and blessed" I have felt my fair share of darkness fighting illness! We get out. We fight through the pain. We rise up and make the best of a very dark situation! Because the clouds WILL part 🌩 and the sun will come back out 🌞 Weathering the storm isn't about the cards you have in your hand... but about how you play the cards you've been dealt. That's why I stepped up to this challenge... AND I HAVE LEARNED A LOT! ✅ I have been rejected over and over again... ✅ Folks I NEVER thought would make a contribution showed up with extreme generosity... ✅ While those I thought would give ignored my inquiry. And THAT'S OKAY. This is a big challenge, but I'm here to fight for the loved ones I've lost and know that as a parent, NO mother or father should EVER have to lose their baby to cancer. Let's cure it. This is my WHY for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society  Please consider making a monetary or auction donation here:  https://lnkd.in/gdjKxAB #MWOY   #GiveBackChallenge   #Healthcare   #Gratitude

I’ve been called “too” competitive. I like to win. I like to learn. And culturally that’s been a bad thing. But I’m learning that if I’m going to “win” I need to lean more into the person that I am and make my strengths (and weaknesses) work for me. And for me it’s simple: am I outworking the old me? Am I better than the old me? Am I working towards the me that I want to be? At the end of the day there is no one on the planet with the same goals + plans as you. No point in competing with someone that’s playing a different game with different rules. Your only [long term] competition is you.  #justQ  🖖🏽🖤

Just imagine me under the 🎄 , giving my grandma her present: an inflatable belt. I’ve got a hard time picturing this, but who knows?  I’ve given serious thoughts to this after I interviewed  TangoBelt ’s Product Development Engineer,  Megan Riley . Falls among the elderly can ruin or even claim lives everywhere in the world. Hip fracture is the most common result of such a fall and it can take months of recovery – if one ever recovers from it.  According to Johns Hopkins Medicine, one in three women and one in five men will have a fracture at some point after age 50. Check out the interview and learn what Tango Belt can do for your beloved seniors!  https://lnkd.in/ebkcHmM   💡 Please note: Patreon members of The Medical Futurist get early access to interviews such as this, and other premium, handpicked content. Your media presence extends beyond what you do in print, video and social media. It's how you present to customers, staff, clients. Think holistically and strategically about the image you want to portray. Once your brand is established, be consistent in every way. It's good to surprise your audience now and again, to entertain a bit, to employ strategic content marketing tactics to engage them, for instance. But above all, people appreciate knowing what to expect - substance, style, all of the above.
